Mendokusai

Tartarus

Flirting

28 Nov 2018

Flirting is hard, especially when your anxiety-to-social-skills ratio is as off-kilter as mine. It's not really something I partake in very much, as I don't have a clue how you're meant to do it, which means that when I do, I am... totally winging it, again.

It is a lot of fun though. Especially when it might actually lead somewhere.
